name: Vitality (Demo Version)
description:
Demo Information:

This is only the demo for Vitality, containing one of the game's dungeons. Vitality is still in active development, and another demo will be released containing this dungeon and one of the game's areas when that area is finished.

Story:

In Vitality, you are able to cast spells based on combining states of matter (called forms) and elements. Using these spells,  you explore the world, clearing dungeons and helping people overcome their fear. Explore a world with a dark past and overcome an evil overlord.

Development:

I post regular updates about Vitality once a month on my YouTube channel, NpathyDev, so if you want to stay up to date on the game's development, make sure to check it out.

How To Play (also explained in game): Keyboard:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
Mouse - Rotate Camera
Space - Jump
Left Click - Cast Spell
C, V, or B: Change which spell slot is selected
Q - Open Spell Book
C, V, or B (in Spell Book): Change which spell is in each slot
Esc - Pause
E - Interact

Controller:

Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Rotate Camera
South Button - Jump
North Button - Cast Spell
Left, Up or Right on the D-Pad: Change which spell slot is selected
Select - Open Spell Book
Left, Up or Right on the D-Pad (in Spell Book): Change which spell is in each slot
Start - Pause
East Button - Interact
